title: Brady Quinn on Week 2, Stephen Oh on rookie projections, Sean Wagner MNF recap (Football 09/25)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Sean Wagner to break down the wild Steelers-Buccaneers game on Monday night and decide whether Jameis Winston should start for the Bucs in Week 4. Then Brady Quinn stops by to talk about all the big storylines from Week 2 of the NFL season. Then Stephen Oh of SportsLine.com joins Will to talk about the projections for the rookie quarterbacks and much more.
